name: Stickman Dual
description:
A game for ScoreSpace 15 with the theme of One Bullet.

This is achieved by giving the player one bullet in the clip, seems simple and boring right? Well when you consider how long it takes to reload and only one bullet needs to hit your opponent to kill them, it makes this quite challenging.

Scoreboard can be viewed at https://infamy.dev/highscore/web?id=a1b781e0-1893-11ec-9a44-9b7fc239ea84UserGame...

Multiplayer Score is determine by your wins.

Note - On the browser version, the game is slightly less stable then the executable builds.

Controls

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Spacebar - Jump

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Right Mouse Button - Aim Down Sights

Keypad - & + - Camera Zoom

Main Menu Controls

1 - Create a game

2 - Join a game 

3 - Open the leaderboards (Opens a website on your browser) 

Credits

GDevelop 5 - Game Engine

Pivot Animator - Stickman Animation Tool

Joel Steudler - Music

remove.bg - removing backgrounds

zapsplat.com - SFX

Audiotrimmer.com - Trimming audio files.
